name: Conspiracy Bureau
description:
Conspiracy Bureau is a small puzzle game where you work creating conspiracy theories for the government (quite an important job). But you have been slacking off recently and you need to improve your results in order to keep the job.

A game made by Ludipe in 2 days for Stay safe! Jam.

Instructions.-

You can control everything with the mouse. There's an icon in the corner to toggle fullscreen, I recommend activating it. The game will try to turn it automatically (but some browsers block it if you are using the web version).

The mechanics of the game are hinted/explained when you interact with the manual (in-game item).
